title.narrative: Market Developement & Access to Markets Phase 1(2014 - 2018)

description.narrative: This activity (Market Developement & Access to Markets Phase 1(2014 - 2018)) is a component of Zimbabwe Livelihoods and Food Security Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £8,534,081. This component benefits Zimbabwe, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural services. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-01-2014 and the end date is 31-07-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - other services
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2018 Quarter 3
